ss.gurmukhi: (iPr dovyW) kumMqR rUp mMqR nUM ivcwrn l`gy।

en.bdb: They all held consultation together and talked to one another about the war.417.

en.bdb: Kumbhkaran used seven thousand metallic pitchers of water to cleanse his face

ss.gurmukhi: kuMBkrn ny Awpxw iBAwnk mUMh pUMJ ilAw।
ss.unicode: ਕੁੰਭਕਰਨ ਨੇ ਆਪਣਾ ਭਿਆਨਕ ਮੂੰਹ ਪੂੰਝ ਲਿਆ।

bdb.gurmukhi: kuMBkrn ny Awpxw iBAwnk mUMh pUMJ ilAw।
bdb.unicode: ਕੁੰਭਕਰਨ ਨੇ ਆਪਣਾ ਭਿਆਨਕ ਮੂੰਹ ਪੂੰਝ ਲਿਆ।

ss.gurmukhi: iPr mws dw Awhwr kIqw Aqy bhuq swrI Srwb pI leI।

verse.gurmukhi: auTXo lY gdw ko BrXo vIr mwnM ]418]
verse.unicode: ਉਠਯੋ ਲੈ ਗਦਾ ਕੋ ਭਰਯੋ ਵੀਰ ਮਾਨੰ ॥੪੧੮॥

en.bdb: He ate flesh to his fill and drank wine excessively. After all this that proud warrior got up with his mace and marched forware.418.

ss.gurmukhi: gOrv nwl BirAw sUrmw gdw lY ky KVw ho igAw ]418]
ss.unicode: ਗੌਰਵ ਨਾਲ ਭਰਿਆ ਸੂਰਮਾ ਗਦਾ ਲੈ ਕੇ ਖੜਾ ਹੋ ਗਿਆ ॥੪੧੮॥

bdb.gurmukhi: gOrv nwl BirAw sUrmw gdw lY ky KVw ho igAw ]418]

en.bdb: The terrible shouts of the warriors were heard and the truncated bodies pared by the arrows were seen moving.419.

verse.unicode: ਉਠੀ ਕੂਹ ਜੂਹੰ ਮਿਲੇ ਸੈਣ ਕ੍ਰੋਧੰ ॥੪੨੦॥

en.bdb: The beautiful horses are rolling down and are warriors are sobbing in the battlefield, there is terrible lamination in the whole field.420.
